amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities Of The Second Class And Villages
amendatorysection.catchline: Board of equalization; counties under township organization; members; meetings.
amendatorysection.para: In all cities of the second class in counties under township organization, the city council and supervisors of such cities shall constitute a board of equalization for such city, whose duty it shall be to meet and equalize the assessments of such city at the same time and in the same manner as now provided by law for townships in counties under township organization.
